title: YalancÄ±
overview: Deniz is a smart, talented, dedicated literature teacher. Mehmet Emir is a famous surgeon. He is the student of his son Deniz. Both haven't let anyone into their lives for quite some time. The attraction between them leads them to a dinner together and then to a series of events that will turn their lives upside down. It would not even occur to them that an innocent meal would compare them and their families with great devastation.
